home.melhores.produtos.descricao: Acetic silicone sealant with fungicide for professional use, suitable for sealing smooth and non-ferrous surfaces - glass, aluminum, tiles, bathroom fixtures, vitrified ceramics, fibers, acrylics, some types of plastics, among others Packaging: Cartridge 280gr.
home.banner.descricao: Our essence is a solid partnership with our customers and suppliers
home.beneficios.formapagamento.descricao: We offer flexible payment options, to make it easier for you.
home.beneficios.politica.descricao: You can return a product within 7 days
home.beneficios.suporte.descricao: Our customer support from monday to friday
home.newsletter.descricao: Subscribe our newsletter and receive promotions
home.newsletter.aviso: We will never spam you. Only useful information
empresa.secao1.titulo: Thinking of better solutions for the construction industry?
empresa.secao1.descricao: UNIPRO Selantes was founded with the aim of not only presenting, but also making these solutions available in the best possible way, quickly, practically and safely.
empresa.secao2.subtitulo: Working in the distribution and representation of sealants and fasteners for more than a decade.
empresa.secao2.descricao: UNIPRO has been solidifying more and more and increasing its area of ​​activity, also bringing other materials from the Civil Construction sector.
empresa.secao2.produto1.descricao: Sealant for professional use, adheres to different surfaces, water resistant, etc.
empresa.secao2.produto2.descricao: Drilling bits of various sizes, fixing metallic structures, wood, aluminum, etc.
empresa.secao2.produto3.descricao: Several other products aimed at the civil and industrial construction sector.
empresa.secao3.descricao: Now, also operating in INDUSTRIAL sector, we manufacture our own line of sealants,fasteners and silicones,,bringing more and more quality, value and safety to our customers and partners.
empresa.secao4.descricao: Get to know UNIPRO, the most complete industry in the interior of São Paulo, with a total commitment to the customer!
empresa.localizacao.descricao: Located in Marília, in the interior of the state of São Paulo, we deliver throughout Brazil, and we are committed not only to creating, but also to maintaining a solid and lasting partnership with our partners and customers, with the best sales and delivery conditions in the market.
produtos.pu-40.descricao: Sealant for professional use, adheres to different surfaces - glass, concrete, wood, metal, fiber, ceramics, rubber, etc. Cures on contact with ambient humidity to form a tough, flexible rubber. It can be painted, washed and does not form fungus.
produtos.pu-40.aplicacao: Indicated for the most diverse applications of sealing, filling and repairs in civil construction.
produtos.pu-const.descricao: It is a modified polyurethane sealant used for various applications of sealing, filling and repairs in civil construction.
produtos.pu-const.aplicacao: Adheres to various surfaces such as glass, concrete, wood, metal, fiber, porcelain, some types of plastic and rubber.
produtos.ms-hi.descricao: Sealant and adhesive based on hybrid polymers developed for fastening applications in ambient glazing systems.
produtos.ms-hi.aplicacao: Collages of aluminum profiles on glass, perimeter seals between aluminum profiles, glass and masonry, structural joints.
produtos.sili-ne.descricao: Neutral cure silicone sealant for professional use. Cures on contact with atmospheric moisture, transforming into a flexible and waterproof rubber.
produtos.sili-ne.aplicacao: Sealing and filling of finishing joints. Adheres to various surfaces, glass, concrete, polycarbonate, fiberglass and some types of plastics.
produtos.sili-ace.descricao: Acetic cure silicone sealant with fungicide for professional use.
produtos.sili-ace.aplicacao: Sealing in glass and aluminum, ceramics, porcelain and fibers.
produtos.sili-ace-15.descricao: Acetic curing silicone sealant with fungicide for professional use. It cures in contact with atmospheric humidity, transforming into a flexible and impermeable rubber. Does not form fungus.
produtos.sili-ace-15.aplicacao: Indicated for the most diverse applications of sealing, filling and repairs in civil construction.
produtos.sili-baseagua.descricao: Silanized acrylic elastomer sealant that, after drying, becomes a colorless, flexible, impermeable, and great resistance.
produtos.sili-baseagua.aplicacao: It is used for the perimeter sealing of doors and windows, shower cabins, tanks, sinks and various finishes, suitable for indoor and outdoor applications.
produtos.fix-es.descricao: Adhesive based on hybrid polymers, pasty consistency, with non-sag properties. Solvent-free, it does not cause stains on the surface of mirrors.
produtos.fix-es.aplicacao: Gluing and fixing of mirrors and glass on different surfaces of civil construction, without producing stains or any other type of alteration.
produtos.fix-tu.descricao: Extra strong single-component adhesive, formulated based on a hybrid polymer and free of solvents and hydrocarbons, which dries by absorbing moisture and at room temperature.
produtos.fix-tu.aplicacao: Smooth and porous surfaces, masonry, wood, marble and granite, mirrors, glass, aluminum, steel, mirrors, tiles and other civil construction surfaces.
produtos.fix-cub.descricao: High initial tack adhesive for professional use based on hybrid polymers. Does not stain surfaces.
produtos.fix-cub.aplicacao: Fixing metallic and ceramic vats in marble and granite sinks.
produtos.pu-ved.descricao: Sealant for professional use, adheres to different surfaces - glass, concrete, wood, metal, fiber, ceramics, rubber, etc. Cures on contact with ambient humidity to form a tough, flexible rubber. It can be painted, washed and does not form fungus.
produtos.pu-ved.aplicacao: Indicated for the most diverse applications of sealing, filling and repairs in civil construction.
produtos.sa-che.descricao: Single-component sealant based on a high-performance Hybrid Polymer, specially developed for the various existing applications in civil construction.
produtos.sa-che.aplicacao: Vertical and horizontal expansion joints for prefabricated concrete structures or panels with movement of up to 12.5%.
produtos.esp-exp.descricao: Liquid polymer, which assumes a solid state when it comes into contact with air. The volume of the product expands over the surface, transforming it into a compact and resistant mass that does not shrink or give in to pressure.
produtos.esp-exp.aplicacao: Used in manual work, such as space insulation and in filling or sealing holes and when dry it is possible to cut it.
produtos.desen.descricao: General and industrial use, being ideal for use in parts, joints, pulleys and gears of industrial machines.
produtos.desen.aplicacao: Lubricant that deseizes, lubricates and reduces friction and wear between different types of metal parts.
produtos.paraf.descricao: Used for fastening metallic structures, joining sheets and profiles, fastening wood to steel, aluminum, etc.
produtos.paraf.aplicacao: Hexagon screw, flat, flanged and pan. Various sizes, check out our Specifications or contact us.
produtos.broc.descricao: Used for fastening metallic structures, joining sheets and profiles, fastening wood to steel, aluminum, etc.
produtos.broc.aplicacao: Hexagonal, flat, flanged and pan drilling. Several measures, check in the Specifications or contact us.
produtos.bucha.descricao: Used to cut resistant materials such as steel, metal, aluminum and iron. It can also be used to cut stone, foundry materials, wood, concrete, ceramics and plaster.
produtos.bucha.aplicacao: Nylon bushing, plastic bushing with and without ring and brick bushing from Bahia. Various sizes, check out our Specifications or contact us.
produtos.disco.descricao: Used to cut resistant materials such as steel, metal, aluminum and iron. It can also be used to cut stone, foundry materials, wood, concrete, ceramics and plaster.
produtos.disco.aplicacao: Flap disc, roughing disc and cutting disc. Several measures, check in the Specifications or contact us.
produtos.broc-reb.descricao: Used for fastening metallic structures, joining sheets and profiles, fastening wood to steel, aluminum, etc.
produtos.broc-reb.aplicacao: Drills, rivets and tips. Various sizes, check out our Specifications or contact us.
main.contato.valor.frete.resposta: It varies by delivery region, when making the budget the freight is negotiated according to the order value.
main.contato.forma.pagamento.titulo: What are the payment methods and deadlines?
main.contato.forma.pagamento.resposta: We have 3 forms of payment, in the pix in advance, credit card we generate a link for you to make the payment and in the boleto depending on the amount up to 4x.
main.contato.entrega.resposta: Our delivery is outsourced by some carriers, depending on the delivery region.
main.contato.localizacao.resposta: We are from Marília, in the interior of São Paulo, but we deliver all over Brazil.
main.contato.tempo.entrega.resposta: Varies by customer location. North and Northeast 15 working days.
